言うにやおよぶ: (いうにやおよぶ) - it is needless to say
言うにや及ぶ: (いうにやおよぶ) - it is needless to say
言うに事を欠いて: (いうにことをかいて) - that's not a nice thing to say; that's not a nice way of putting it; there was no need to say that
言うに事欠いて: (いうにことかいて) - that's not a nice thing to say; that's not a nice way of putting it; there was no need to say that
言うに及ばず: (いうにおよばず) - needless to say
言うに言われぬ: (いうにいわれぬ) - beyond expression; unspeakable; inexpressible; indescribable
言うのをはばからない: (いうのをはばからない) - do not hesitate to say
言うは易く行うは難し: (いうはやすくおこなうはかたし) - Easier said than done
言うまでもない: (ゆうまでもない) - it goes without saying; there is no need to say so, but of course; it is needless to say; it need scarcely be said
言うまでもなく: (ゆうまでもなく) - obviously; as we all know; needless to say; of course; it goes without saying
言うもおろか: (いうもおろか) - to go without saying
言うも愚か: (いうもおろか) - to go without saying
言う事なし: (いうことなし) - nothing one can say (e.g. about something perfect)
言う事を聞かない: (いうことをきかない) - not doing as one is told; disobedient; unruly
言う事を聞く: (いうことをきく) - to do what one is told to; to take someone's advice; to listen to what someone says
言う事無し: (いうことなし) - nothing one can say (e.g. about something perfect)
言う成り: (いうなり) - doing as one is told; yes-man
言う所の: (いうところの) - what is called; as it is called; the so-called; known as; so to speak
言う迄もない: (ゆうまでもない) - it goes without saying; there is no need to say so, but of course; it is needless to say; it need scarcely be said
言う迄も無い: (ゆうまでもない) - it goes without saying; there is no need to say so, but of course; it is needless to say; it need scarcely be said
言う通り: (いうとおり) - (often as 〜が言う通りに〜 or 〜の言うの通りに〜) as (somebody) says
言えてる: (いえてる) - You can say that again; Nice one
言たって: (いったって) - even if I told you
言ったって: (いったって) - even if I told you
言った言わない: (いったいわない) - he said, she said (differing unsubstantiated testimony)
言ってのける: (いってのける) - to declare; to speak out; to warn; to spit out (words)
言ってみれば: (いってみれば) - in a manner of speaking; as it were; so to speak; if you like; per se
言って退ける: (いってのける) - to declare; to speak out; to warn; to spit out (words)
言っとくけど: (いっとくけど) - for your information; I'm telling you
言っぱ: (いっぱ) - this means; that is to say
言づける: (ことづける) - to send word/to send a message; to make an excuse/to make a pretext of
言づて: (ことづて) - (oral) message; declaration; hearsay; rumour; rumor
言の葉: (ことのえ) - word; waka (classic Japanese poem, esp. a tanka)
言わす: (いわす) - to be able to say; to get someone to say; to induce someone to say; to let someone speak out
言わずと知れた: (いわずとしれた) - as everyone knows; needless to point out
言わずもがな: (いわずもがな) - (it) goes without saying/needn't be said; should rather be left unsaid
言わず語らず: (いわずかたらず) - to be tacit
言わせておく: (いわせておく) - to let someone say
言わでも: (いわでも) - goes without saying/needn't be said; should rather be left unsaid
言わでものこと: (いわでものこと) - something that goes without saying/something that needn't be said; something that should rather be left unsaid
言わでもの事: (いわでものこと) - something that goes without saying/something that needn't be said; something that should rather be left unsaid
言わないことではない: (いわないことではない) - I told you so
言わぬが花: (いわぬがはな) - some things are better left unsaid; silence is golden
言わば: (いわば) - so to speak; so to call it; as it were
言われてみれば: (いわれてみれば) - now that you say that; now that you mention it
言われるがまま: (いわれるがまま) - (doing) as one is told
言われるが儘: (いわれるがまま) - (doing) as one is told
言わんこっちゃない: (いわんこっちゃない) - I told you so
言わんとする: (いわんとする) - (what) one is trying to say; (what) one wants to say; (what) one is saying; (what) one means
言わんばかり: (いわんばかり) - as if to say; as much as to say; as though
言わんや: (いわんや) - much more; not to mention; not to speak of; to say nothing of; let alone
言わ猿: (いわざる) - say-not monkey (one of the three wise monkeys)
言をまたない: (げんをまたない) - needless to say; it goes without saying that
言を俟たない: (げんをまたない) - needless to say; it goes without saying that
言を守る: (げんをまもる) - to keep one's word
言を左右にする: (げんをさゆうにする) - to equivocate; to beat around the bush
言丸める: (いいまるめる) - to do sweet-talk
言争い: (いいあらそい) - a quarrel; argument
言争う: (いいあらそう) - to quarrel; to dispute
言交す: (いいかわす) - to have a chat with; to exchange words or promises; to promise; to get engaged
言交わす: (いいかわす) - to have a chat with; to exchange words or promises; to promise; to get engaged
言付かる: (ことづかる) - to be entrusted with; to be asked to
言付ける: (ことづける) - to send word/to send a message; to make an excuse/to make a pretext of
言伝: (ことづて) - (oral) message; declaration; hearsay; rumour; rumor
言伝える: (いいつたえる) - to send word
言伝て: (ことづて) - (oral) message; declaration; hearsay; rumour; rumor
言偏: (ごんべん) - kanji "word" radical at left
言做す: (いいなす) - to speak as though something were actually the case; to smooth over; to describe
言兼ねる: (いいかねる) - to find it hard to say
言出しっぺ: (いいだしっぺ) - first person to say something/first person to suggest something; (orig. meaning) he who smelt it dealt it/the first person who claims innocence is guilty
言出しっ屁: (いいだしっぺ) - first person to say something/first person to suggest something; (orig. meaning) he who smelt it dealt it/the first person who claims innocence is guilty
言出しべ: (いいだしべ) - first person to say something/first person to suggest something; (orig. meaning) he who smelt it dealt it/the first person who claims innocence is guilty
言出し屁: (いいだしべ) - first person to say something/first person to suggest something; (orig. meaning) he who smelt it dealt it/the first person who claims innocence is guilty
言出す: (いいだす) - to start talking; to speak; to tell; to propose; to suggest; to break the ice
言分: (いいぶん) - one's say; one's point; complaint; excuse
言切る: (いいきる) - to declare/to assert/to state definitively; to finish saying/to say it all/to finish one's sentence
言動: (げんどう) - speech and conduct; words and deeds
言及ぶ: (いいおよぶ) - to refer to; to mention (e.g. theme)
言古した言葉: (いいふるしたことば) - hackneyed saying
言古す: (いいふるす) - to say repeatedly; to say proverbially
言合う: (いいあう) - to say to each other/to exchange (jokes, comments, etc.); to quarrel/to dispute
言合わせる: (いいあわせる) - to agree in advance
言含める: (いいふくめる) - to give detailed instructions
言囃す: (いいはやす) - to praise; to spread or circulate a rumor (rumour)
言回す: (いいまわす) - to express in a roundabout way
